Change Log for OppiaMobile Platform Components
================================================

The OppiaMobile platform consists of 3 core components (server, client app and 
the Moodle export block). This page summarises the currently released versions 
of each of these and the changelog history for each.


OppiaMobile Server (on Django)
--------------------------------

Current Version: 0.5.2

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   changelog_server


OppiaMobile Client App (Android)
-----------------------------------

Current Version: 48 (4.1.2)

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   changelog_android
   
OppiaMobile export block for Moodle
------------------------------------- 

Current Version: v2014102900

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   changelog_moodleblock
